select m.tradeCode,m.cashNo,m.addTime,m.money/100 money,m.payType,c.`name` cashName from m_cashFlow m LEFT JOIN t_cashier c on c.cashierId=m.cashierId where m.storeId= #{relationMap.storeId} and m.`status`=1 and m.type='1'
AND m.userId=#{relationMap.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(m.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(m.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND m.payType = #{relationMap.payType}
AND ( m.cashNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
order by m.addTime desc

select m.tradeCode,m.cashNo,m.addTime, cast((m.money/100) as DECIMAL(13,1)) money, CASE m.payType WHEN 1 THEN '支付宝支付' WHEN 2 THEN '微信支付' ELSE '现金' END payType , c.`name` cashName from m_cashFlow m LEFT JOIN t_cashier c on c.cashierId=m.cashierId where m.storeId= #{storeId} and m.`status`=1 and m.type='1'
AND m.userId=#{userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(m.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(m.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND m.payType = #{payType}
AND ( m.cashNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
order by m.addTime desc
select tradeCode,DATE_FORMAT(`addTime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') `addTime`,storeId,money/100 money,payType from m_cashFlow m inner join sys_user s on m.userId = s.userId limit 10
